From telegram ( my previous points )
https://temporals.herokuapp.com/time_series/13/safeLow

Safe Low gas price is volatile = it means that for many people their UX looks like this:
- create transaction 
- check ETH gas station for safe low gas price 
- decide if they want fast or slow confirmation time ( mental math ) \
then adding epsilon to safe low price ( tricky and hard to do in metamask )
And if user would use too much gas fee ( interface actually allows for such errors ) then he will feel cheated

TBH electrum has solved fees better as there is slider that doesn't even allow for gas_fee equivalent to be higher than what's required to put it in first block
